local_intent: Lower onto red_plate until contact, verify contact, open gripper to release, then retreat
assumptions: Robot is positioned over red_plate (IsAt true) or can approach and align

coherence_with_global: Implements the 'place' phase of the global BT: approach over red_plate, execute LowerUntilContact (with retry), verify contact, release white plate, and retreat as specified in the global plan and description.
